UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Diastereoisomers of cytolysins, a novel class of potent antibacterial peptides.
Literature.Author: Shai Y, Oren Z

Literature.Title: A class of highly potent antibacterial peptides derived from pardaxin, a pore-forming peptide isolated from Moses sole fish Pardachirus marmoratus
Literature.Author: Oren Z, Shai Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=5 µM,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=10 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D21(MIC=3µM),Acinetobacter calcoaceticus Ac11(MIC=2-3µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=0.8µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=1.2-1.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=15µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=2µM)
